website_summaries.verdict: A breakaway collar that holds up to most determined escape artists, its construction quality bodes well for a collar that won’t disappear after a couple days of wear.
pros: Breakaway collar holds up well under everyday pressure
Nylon doesn’t get “frizzy” after long-term use
cons: A bit too large for kittens or smaller cats
Collar’s stiff build can irritate cats with thin or no hair
Bells ring faintly, which some owners don’t like (but others consider a blessing)
Collar can loosen at adjustable clasp

customer_reviews.title: Cute- but don't work
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to write a negative review. I contacted seller w no response. We rescue cats, we use many collars. These collars r adorable- but they don't stay on - the release is way too loose. The collars were off the cats in under 6 hours. I have other collars from Amazon that r on the cats for months. I wasted this money and in rescue there is no more to waste. As I said they t adorable- but if they don't stay on the cats. Also, the seller could have responded. Sorry for being negative.
customer_reviews.author: Natureskeep

customer_reviews.title: Not All Bells Are Made Alike
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would just highlight a few things since we really like these collars. First is the breakaway catch. Not too easy to open, yet easy enough if it hooks on something. That's the way it should be. Adjustment of the collar is simple and effective. And should I mention we also realized that not all bells are made alike. We have had several other brands and the volume and clarity of these bells are far superior to the others. Honestly, why have a collar with a bell you can't hear? Buy a couple, because just like cats, you can't have just one !!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine March

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cats who like to destroy collars.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this 2-pack for our cat who magically destroys her collars. We were tired of paying pet-store prices for collars that didn't last more than a month. THESE ARE GREAT! Our crazy cat has been wearing it for over a month with no signs of wear. We haven't even had to use the second one yet. The colors are so bright and the quality is far above the ones we normally buy at pet stores for 2-3X the price. We were also happy that the collars fit her, as she is tiny and normally wears kitten collars.
customer_reviews.author: Mkt27

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Several months later and it hasn't fallen off or become frizzy. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: best collar skittles has ever had
customer_reviews.text: These things last forever. Skittles is hard on collars. Most break-aways come off him too easily and get lost. He's only managed to remove this one once and that was during a trip in the car(it was a rough day all around). He's had these for a while and a little paint has worn off of the bell. Other than that, it is still in pretty much new condition. Most collars I've purchased have either been junk or ridiculously priced. This one is a real value.
customer_reviews.author: Slayer6

customer_reviews.title: Buy no other -
customer_reviews.text: Excellent breakaway collar, it's the only one we will purchase. One of our cats is very active, always venturing into places we would prefer it not go, and occasionally comes home without the color & name tag. We prefer this happen rather than havening our cat accidently hang herself or get caught-up somewhere unable to get loose. We also have name tags on the collars, and on several occasions neighbor friends have returned the collars.
customer_reviews.author: Great-Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Great cute collar
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my indoor older cat as more of a decorative flair. It’s lightweight and stretchy allowing easy breakaway if necessary. She loves it and unbeknownst to me, my younger cat also loves it. Great for cats who may not be used to wearing a collar without being restrictive in any way. Can easily be slipped over their heads. Would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: MEOW

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and chic, but not for skinny necks
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars, they are chic and made of a high quality material. The only downside is the position of the bow loop, which makes tightening the collar for a skinny cat impossible. I eventually cut the threads holding the bow in place to move it further back, but it was sewn on tightly and took a long time with my seam ripper to fully free it. I wish they would place the bow at the very center back and only sew it to the outside part rather than through both sides of the strap. Otherwise, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: 5 Plus Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Blueberry safety breakaway cat collars. Lightweight, Durable, has a little bell that always keeps me informed where my two male cats are in my home. The collars are so cute and look adorable on my cats. These collars are really exactly what I wanted. I recommend cat owners to consider buying these collars from Blueberry Pet. They arrived on time, well packaged and my two big boys can wear the collars comfortably. Of course they are adjustable, so no problem in getting the right fit for cat's neck. A 5 plus product...
customer_reviews.author: Sanddee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collar for outside adventurers!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve got two kitties and both are HARD on collars. Our girl is out and about exploring during the day and she is very particular about her bells. If she doesn’t like the bell noise she will rip off the collar by any means necessary. She loves this bell and the snap could break away on the collar if she needed/wanted to get rid of it. Our boy is a little trickster that has scratched through several collars. This one has stood the test of time and still looks new after a few months of wear. Have bought this set twice and will buy again happily if they lose or break away their collars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stitching -> Flower Stays When Cat Tried to Bite It Off
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product but I was sad that it was too big for my kitten that is only 3 lb. I'm not sure if the product description says that this product is not meant for kittens, but I'm here to say that it isn't. When I measured her, I thought it would fit, but then I found out that the measuring tape was not made in America and they messed up printing the customary measurements on the measuring tape haha! If you have a regular sized cat, I highly suggest getting this product because it is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar simply because I wanted an animal print with a bell on it. This our 3rd bell collar and it does not bother her. The clasp is good and the color doesn’t look dingy. However she is inside cat and doesn’t get dirty. I am very pleased with this collar. It is the prettiest collar she has and cheapest one Ive bought her and it has held up just as good if not better than then pricier ones she has had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H Lynn

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Well with these collars you get what you pay for. My one cat figured out how to take off the collar every day for the first week until he got used to it. I guess its good because it definitely is easy to break away. Then the other cat lost the bell on the collar. Weeks later both collars now have missing bells. The collars do also loosen as they wear them so we are always having to tighten them back up. Cheap is what you're looking for then this is the product for you. I'll be searching for better quality when it is time to replace collars.
customer_reviews.author: KRL6

customer_reviews.title: Poor design all around
customer_reviews.text: Someone was not thinking regarding the personalization. The stitching matches the design and is impossible to read. If car gets lost and a Good Samaritan wants to help return cat there is an excellent change they would totally miss the lettering. What I will say is company rectified this promptly with my desire to do lettering in black. This was much better BUT the cats get the collars off easily and I struggle to get them on. SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Quick release feature can be a life saver.
customer_reviews.text: Just the cutest collars and the quick release saved my kitty's life. She was up in the basement window and her collar got caught on the little release lever and she either jumped down or fell, but I noticed she didn't have her collar on and found it hanging from that hook. She was fine and didn't seem like she'd been through any horrible trauma, but this would have been a huge tragedy if I came home and found her hanging there. SUPER grateful at the quality of this collar.
customer_reviews.author: FramFram Minnesotan

customer_reviews.title: Great breakaway collars!
customer_reviews.text: These are the ones to buy! Did my research - best reviews. I have 2 cats, one is about 6, the other almost 2. They've never had collars, so was concerned they'd fuss. They don't even try to get them off. (Did take the bells off, easy to do.) I love that they're breakaway. Was able to adjust to less than 9 inches. And they're beautiful collars! And Cookie and Scamper look beautiful, too!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Levy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these collars. I bought specifically for the style and breakaway. My cat is indoor only but wanted her to be able to free herself if she ever got caught on something. So far it has worked great!!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The collars are lovely, great fit for both of our cats even though they one is a large cat and the other a medium. The elastic in the color keeps them firm around the neck so it doesn't get hung on anything but its not tight as to choke them either. While they have only just arrived today the rhinestones seem to be firmly attached and the stitching is strong. It does have a clasp but found it was really not needed, they stretch to go right over the head.
customer_reviews.author: dco

customer_reviews.title: Great collars!
customer_reviews.text: I love these collars. So far, they have stayed on which is an accomplishment with my cats. Only gave it 4 stars because for this design I didn't like the little loop that is sewed on. It seems like they could get their paw stuck in it and just looked odd. I carefully cut the stitches and removed.
customer_reviews.author: My-StCroix

customer_reviews.title: meowwww
customer_reviews.text: These collars are friggin adorable. I have an indoor/outdoor cat, who is very active and I expect that collars won't last more than a month. This collar is going strong! He isn't annoyed by the material whatsoever... I have yet to see him scratch or paw at the collar. My only wish is that they had some more masculine collars available. I'm not putting a pink bow on my fierce male bird hunter.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived, my mother accepted the package and wasn't sure why I ordered collars with a break away release for our dog. She soon realized I always use these for my small terrier, and they're meant to break away if she ever gets caught in or on something. The collars are very cute, and they stay secure on my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Athena B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BOTHER BUYING THIS PERSONALIZED
customer_reviews.text: The low rating is not for the collar it is because on one collar the cats name and phone number is completely obscured by the pattern. Unreadable. Otherwise its a good light weight collar. But I would not have bought it if I had known that the cats information is not readable.
customer_reviews.author: jkuci

customer_reviews.title: Shred up after one month
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my two kitties to enjoy these collars. I read reviews and people said they were durable. No. They were shredded up into strings after one month. My cats are indoor, I cut their nails when needed & we only have an apartment. They’re lazy mostly, but love to play... so I figured they’d be fine. I’ve never had collars that did that... even cheap ones. Won’t buy from Blueberry again.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Blueberry Cat Collars... Love Them But....
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these collars! the only issue i had with them is that they were way to big for my 10 week old kitten. I had to do some fanageling to get it to where it will fit her. The fabric on the collar is very sturdy and the the breakaway clasp has the perfect resistance. I would definitely recommend these collars to any cat lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D

customer_reviews.title: This breakaway collar save my cat's life!
customer_reviews.text: This collar saved my cat's life! I got a call from a gentleman who found my cat's collar underneath one of the cars at his dealership. Apparently my cat got underneath a car in my complex to shield himself from the rain storm. It would seem that the owner of the car started it up and my cat was able to escape with the help of his breakaway collar. I would highly recommend this collar! 🦊🐾❤
customer_reviews.author: JW, Smyrna, GA

customer_reviews.title: At first I thought the breakaway closure was too snug to easily pull apart if my cats got caught on something ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I bought these so my cats could have coordinating collars. At first I thought the breakaway closure was too snug to easily pull apart if my cats got caught on something but it actually stays shut when it needs to be shut and pulls apart when a moderate amount of tension is applied. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jessica m

customer_reviews.title: cute, but cute isn't enough.
customer_reviews.text: the collars are really cute, but they are very stiff which makes resizing difficult, as the collar does not stay creased where it should, and stays creased where it shouldn't. this means it sits funny on my cat's neck and annoys her. sadly, i will probably have to purchase a new collar to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: kichi

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these twice. The fabric holds up well, but my cat just has a tendency to lose collars outdoors about 2x per year (but these aren’t too easy to breakaway). I love the designs, and the bell has a nice jingle. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: mkp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute!! I can't wait until the engraved tags arrive to add to them. Easy off clasp, but not so easy it would come off in a non-emergency. One cat loves his, the other cat hates his ha, but i love them! My kitty boys look very handsome & I get the security that others will know they already have a home. I plan to get more for gifts. 😻❤ UPDATE: One car lost his within the first day, other Cat lost his within first week. A little too easy to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My cat always and I mean always ends up having his collar fall apart at the seams and this is why I bought a two pack and I bought this months and months ago and he is still on his first one. They usually only last about a month. He always gets into things and tries to get outside and I live in the woods with lots of animals around so I need a sturdy collar with tags just in case he gets out this is the only collar that hasn’t fallen apart
customer_reviews.author: Tor Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bow good quality
customer_reviews.text: (account holder's wife here) It looks like it does on the package. Package contained two collars. I dressed my cat in one for Christmas and gave one as a gift for another Cat mommy friend. Reasonable price for these collars. My cat is mellow so I can't say how it would hold out on a rough and tumble cat.
customer_reviews.author: WHC

customer_reviews.title: I love that the collar stays on (others have come off ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that the collar stays on (others have come off too easily), but still has the safety release when needed. The material in these seems to last longer than others I've tried- the pattern still looks great and there's no fuzzing of the fabric after 2 years, where cheaper collars get fuzzy and worn after several weeks with our cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Clasp Insufficient - My Cat Lost This Collar in less than 5 minutes - total waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My cat lost this collar within 5 minutes of me putting it on. The clasp is not secure enough at all. Now I have the second one from the pack which is pointless to even use. Complete waste of money. I normally love Blueberry pet and their products are great, but I am sorry I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Ross

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are two in the package
customer_reviews.text: This collar holds up well, does snap open when needed, but doesn't just randomly snap open, don't worry. Very satisfied with the company and the product.I took the bells off. The cat has her name tag and a chip tag and the collar holds them well. She's active and into everything and the collar looks darling on her. She bites it, it doesn't fray like her last one did.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kline

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but bell is not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Collars are cute, but bell is too small and soft sounding. One cat will wear it the other will not. I should have bought the one with the reflective strip instead, but these work ok. Probably fine for a smaller cat. My cats are Maine coons and the collars are not quite beefy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Seashell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Loud bell (so be sure that is something you want. Haha.) Our kitten was pretty small when she first started wearing it, so I was concerned she would pull it off, but she didn’t (she tried the first day and it hasn’t bothered her since). I like the breakaway; it isn’t too easy or too difficult to unlatch.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Colars
customer_reviews.text: We have two BIG cats, and was concerned to make sure they had good break away collars that would be sturdy enough to last, yet be safe for them both. We've had them for some time now, and the collars work brilliantly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan F

customer_reviews.title: Not All Bells Are Made Alike
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would just highlight a few things since we really like these collars. First is the breakaway catch. Not too easy to open, yet easy enough if it hooks on something. That's the way it should be. Adjustment of the collar is simple and effective. And should I mention we also realized that not all bells are made alike. We have had several other brands and the volume and clarity of these bells are far superior to the others. Honestly, why have a collar with a bell you can't hear? Buy a couple, because just like cats, you can't have just one !!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine March

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality collars.
customer_reviews.text: These collars are bright and cute! I needed a breakaway collar, but didn't want one that came apart TOO easily, like other collars I've ordered before. These collars seem to fit the bill, and neither of my cats have managed to rip them off, yay! I chose to take off the bell, so my poor cats wouldn't have it ringing in their ears all day. Overall, I think they're a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: AJane

customer_reviews.title: Great cat collar, with easy breakaway that still stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the break away collars we've been through fall off. This one however is more sturdy. It takes a little more to come off, but in the most perfect sense. My cat isn't bothered by it b/c it's light weight. Looks great and very functional. I would recommend this brand in general, we've experienced great quality in dog collars as well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keys

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors and well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this four months ago to replace one that had completely frayed. My kitty constantly scratches due to allergies, and most collars just don't hold up well. This one doesn't have a mark on it or a string out of place. Both collars are cute, but Izzy picked the darker one that's a little less girly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great brand of collars
customer_reviews.text: These collars are adorable. I really like the breakaway feature. They're strong enough to stay on the cat for normal wear but release when they need to. I have a cat that got stuck somewhere for 3 days before she got out of the "breakaway" collar she was wearing so I'm now very paranoid about collars and make sure that if I hold onto her collar that it will release with minimal struggling on her part. This collar far exceeds my expectations in that department. My cat barely had to pull against the collar for it to pop open. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RabidTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very gorgeous collars and the breakaway is not a weak connection. Most cat collars I have bought in the past have had very weak breakaway connections to where my cat could have been scratching his neck the wrong way and the thing would have flown off. This connection stays put, and only lasts for a second or two when my cat gets seriously caught on something, making me feel better because i know he wont choke himself.
customer_reviews.author: KaSandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute patterns, good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two pack for my cats because it was a great deal, but now that I've put the collars on my kitties I think they really look good. The patterns are cute and I like the fact they're breakaway. Blueberry Pet is a good brand, these are the second set of Blueberry collars I've gotten for my cats. The first pair I had to replace because my cats like to chew on each other collars when they lay together, they're still totally usable so the collars can take abuse, but I wanted to replace them anyway for aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: mplsnme

customer_reviews.title: Cuuuuute & durable!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable & cute. Normally my cats are annoyed by the collar & scratch at it, but either they aren't annoyed by these or the material is withstanding their claws! I did remove the bells though. I can't stand bells on cat collars & I'm sure my cats would second that.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but seem to come off too easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute collars, and the bell is not overly jingly (technical term!!), but they seem to come off rather easily. My cats seem to be missing their collar at least once every other week. Since my Siamese is afraid of life itself, getting the collar back on her is a HUGE pain in the butt. Yes, I do understand that the breakaway feature is important, in fact I wouldn't buy a collar without it, I think this one may be just a tad too easy to get off.
customer_reviews.author: CMP

customer_reviews.title: Adorable collars, sturdy but easy-release clamps - very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when these arrived and they are so cute! They’re perfect, and the bells were very easy to remove, I’ve had trouble removing other collar bells. They are not too hard or easy to remove, it clamps just enough, i haven’t had any of them remove their collars and they’ve been wearing them for about three weeks. Am looking into buying other sets of the same brand!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: I really love these collars
customer_reviews.text: I really love these collars. They look and are very sturdy but also flexible around my cats' neck. The design is so cute and both my cats look gorgeous with them. It is also very easy for me to get them off the cats and easy enough to put it back on. It is safe for them and it doesn't get dirty too easily. It is easily adjustable and it stays the way you adjust it. My cats don't even try to take them off. Great buy. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sambatuca

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This collar fits well, stays put, and the cat doesn't mind it. What else could I ask for?! I bought it to warn the wildlife critters about my cats approach, as I was tired of cleaning up after his "prizes".
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Cute collar but not made well
customer_reviews.text: I love how pretty this collar is on my kitty, and it fits my 13 lb cat just fine. The material isn't great though... There are strings and fuzzies coming off of it and its only been a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: butterfliiesinFL

customer_reviews.title: Quality and safety in these collars
customer_reviews.text: Quality collars with a break-away latch so cats can't get hung up somewhere. Adorable complimentary collars if you have 2 cats. I cut off the bells, but this is a solid, well-constructed collar, and a steal at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Parent

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These collars are very cute! My two kittens love them also! The material is very thick and durable for the two kittens. They love to chewy on previous collars so when I found these I knew these collars would be perfect, and they are!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great harness and leash
customer_reviews.text: Cute harness and comes with a nice leash. We probably won’t use the leash but the harness is great, our cat was always trying to push her collar off
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kitty that i like to send out in the yard to play. He lost the first one within the first 3 days, but this second one has stayed on for a good month or more. At least I know he won't get hung up anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: TTYMETop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not soft enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very soft collar. It rubbed my cat's neck raw. It was the right size and looked nice. Too rough. I have a tuxedo cat, if you need to know the type of fur.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Size is too big for a cat collar
customer_reviews.text: The 9”-13” is way too big for a normal size cat. I shortened it as much as possible and it was still far too loose. My cat is pretty big—I’d say she’s bigger than average— and this was so loose she immediately got it up over her lower jaw and got it stuck. If I hadn’t been nearby, she could have really harmed herself. I gave this product three stars because it is really cute and appears to be good quality, but the sizing is off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Durable
customer_reviews.text: These collars are really cute and durable. I have 2 cats, the collar fits perfectly on my male cat. The female is a little smaller and the collar fits her as well when it is the smallest it will go. If you have little cats or kittens the collars will probably be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This one works great with a cat who always manages to pull off her collar. The closure is smooth so nothing to latch her teeth onto. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Hadley

customer_reviews.title: I have been really happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with these. My cat has been wearing the first one for over a year now and it still looks great. Put it on and forget it! I took the bell off because she is an indoor cat (and she already makes enough noise in the morning when she's hungry!)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty collars but seemed a bit thick and cumbersome on a cats neck. They were a little large anyway so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Slbram17

customer_reviews.title: Birds don't seem to hear it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try and prevent further bird killing. I haven't any problems with the bell falling off, the cat eating it or similar problems mentioned in the reviews. Unfortunately it hasn't stopped the bird slaughter. If that is your reason for getting this either the birds around here are pretty stupid or it just doesn't work for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: norton850

customer_reviews.title: Cute cute.
customer_reviews.text: Cute colors! My cats loose their collars every now and then, mainly because they climb trees all the time, glad they unsnap and so they dont get hurt. Maybe every 6 months or so they need a new one. The one cat that doesnt climb trees has had hers for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: They’re cute and pretty cheap but they fray so easily
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and pretty cheap but they fray so easily! They look so used up and worn out so fast and my cat is an indoor only cat. Honestly I’ve had collars from dollar store which have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Drouillard

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality collars and I love buying blueberry products
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality collars and I love buying blueberry products. The only downside is the run a little on the big side for small cats - I have two seven month olds who they are a little too big for now, but I'm hoping they'll fill out in the next few months. They fit their medium sized (12lbs) big sister just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for our indoor/outdoor cat. The bell is so subtle it's not disruptive but is easy to locate her outside. She has wondered out of our area several times and neighbors have easily read her collar and called for her to safely return home. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBeingMommy

customer_reviews.title: Not very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I think this is really cute and I was happy with the value but I just received this and put it on my year old cat and I am envisioning a problem immediately. With the bow it can only be adjusted a little and I couldn’t get snug enough. She immediately got it caught in her mouth trying to pull it off. I don’t see this working.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: under the company label and where the collar is sewn together is extremely rough - feels like a rough plastic material
customer_reviews.text: The inside stitching, under the company label and where the collar is sewn together is extremely rough - feels like a rough plastic material? My kitten scratches like a maniac when I make her wear either.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: You will love these collars.
customer_reviews.text: These collars are fun and unique. I love the plastic closure because there is no squeezing tiny pieces. The male end just fits in the female end through a rounded design that eliminates the button-ish feature of standard connectors. Great quality for the price. I will always be purchasing blueberry collars in the future. Picture isn't very clear but its all I have from before the pictured foster kittens were adopted.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: survive the cat test
customer_reviews.text: my three cats have shredded several cat collars but these stay intact form the cat claws
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Blood

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely precious collars!
customer_reviews.text: The collars are perfect! The leopard collar is slightly big on our black cat, but not too bad. However, she is way smaller than our Lynx Point. The fish collar fits him perfectly with his big head and tons of fur. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: These colors are very well-made. I did take off the bell only because it drives me crazy. My cat never looked so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: BB pet makes the cutest collars ever! My 2 girl cats look extra adorable and unique with their collars
customer_reviews.author: D&CShack

customer_reviews.title: Bell annoys my cats.
customer_reviews.text: The collars are adjustable and fits my 2 different sized cats perfectly. The only thing is, is that if the bell wasn't there, I think my cats wouldn't seem to mind as much as they do.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as another reviewer noted these are the only collars that my cat can't seem to remove. In the past I'd put a new collar on and then within days it would magically disappear. Not so with these. The clasp keeps him from getting it off, they are cute, and they really hold up. Love!
customer_reviews.author: SD Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: These collars are very cute and very durable. Plus the bell helps me when my cat is trying to be a sneaky ninja
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I love these Blueberry collars
customer_reviews.text: Again, I love these Blueberry collars...........they hold up nicely, and my kitties don't seem to mind them.......they have breakaway closures, but my kitties aren't losing them as much as some others I've purchased.....and they are a good price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fink

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement :(
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a girl collar and a boy collar. All t received were girl collars. Was kind of disappointed.collar started falling apart next day
customer_reviews.author: GatheringTree

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty collars!
customer_reviews.text: My girls looked so pretty for the holidays in these collars! They are well made and I especially love the Pearl and rhinestone touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Easily destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, but my cat easily destroyed it within a week. The collar still held up, but the bow and patches of it were reduced to shreds. Picture shows initial destruction that just got worse over time (lol)
customer_reviews.author: Ashe G

customer_reviews.title: Great set of collars for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable set. If they don't hold up to wear I'll edit my review but so far they are doing well and they hold tags nicely. Great price if you have multiple cats like we do.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Poor clasp comes undone easily.
customer_reviews.text: The clasp comes undone easily. One of the collars has been permanently los,t after our cat wore it for only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Visual Vulture

customer_reviews.title: Carefully with font colors
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what font to pick so that the phone number can be read. So i pick the same in the photo ... can barely read the phone number in some places. I’m pretty disappointed. The colors and pattern are cute. But we wanted ID without adding a tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose adjuster
customer_reviews.text: While good quality for the fabric and an interesting clasp type (security, but odd? still strong!), I find it difficult to get the length to stay. The adjuster doesn’t hold strong against wrangly kitties, so make sure you’re willing to readjust if you need to remove it frequently! Still a cute product, and matches my kitties personalities :)
customer_reviews.author: Jade Fine

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it after minor adjustment
customer_reviews.text: My cat hated the strap that went from her throat to her Belly but once I removed it she LOVES it. She will not let me remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality kitty collar.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and adorable. The collar is easy to adjust and the clasp stays put. I especially like the bell, which has a charming ding, rather than an annoying ring.
customer_reviews.author: COBandMOB

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great collars. They feel nice and look expensive. Ive gotten many compliments from guests. I really like how easy it is to snap the collar on and off. The bell works well, and helps our partially blind cat stay aware of our other cats movements.
customer_reviews.author: Dockalock13

customer_reviews.title: Cute but..
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO CUTEEEE!! My kittens have never worn collars before. These are their first. When I got them on them the first time, they couldn't stand it then they got a bit used to it. I love that it's easy for them to break off if needed. It does seem to make them itch a little though
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright colors!
customer_reviews.text: It lets you show your cats personality through the cool designs! They’re durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my cat so many collars and he had this collar on for three months! I have bought other collars on amazon that have not lasted for a weekend and they were more expensive than these! These collars are definitely worth the price and they last!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are just like the picture and my two cats look so cute. I like the bells on the collars because I can hear wherever they are. The clapse makes me rest easy when I’m not at home because it’s a break away.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: Fits both my cats well. They have not once attempted to take the collar off. They seem happy to wear the collar.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: The product is as described, but the green and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described, but the green and pink collar is made out of the stiffest material...it makes me uncomfortable watching my kitty in it. Looking for a new collar to replace. The tribal collar, however, fits well and is comfy on my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn S

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet sturdy material and comfortable around my cat’s neck.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors on the collar and the breakaway snap.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The ones I was buying in the store would get frayed up because of the scratching of my babies. But these have been going strong for 10 months now! I can hear my cats coming and the colors are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: str0ngrnow

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but does not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: My cat lost two collars in the span of 4 days because the safety release on these comes apart way too easily. Looking for another collar that is not as loose.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collars for my indoor/outdoor cats. Will definitely buy again when they lose them.
customer_reviews.author: Marki

customer_reviews.title: I didn't care for these
customer_reviews.text: My cats took these of with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Blueberry brand and buy it for both my cat ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Blueberry brand and buy it for both my cat and dogs! These cat collars are excellent and great quality, they're very true to color, are breakaway, and good material, and have a small D ring to attach tags!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable if you have playful cats
customer_reviews.text: It frayed so quickly I threw them away after two weeks. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jess H

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good quality, the colors are so cut on boteh of my cats. exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.author: XtraX

product_meta.title: Blueberry Pet 10+ Patterns Breakaway Safety Cat Collars, Personalized Cat Collars, Cat Harness & Leash Sets, Accessory Set
feature_bullets: With the coming holiday season, we are releasing a value pack with two of our favorite cat collars, geometrical patterns of parallel and diamond.
Designed with adjustable and breakaway buckle, a guarantee for your cat being fabulous and safe under any situation.
All-match pieces that suit all breeds and every mood for even the pickiest feline!
Made with durable and high density polyester webbing, easy to take care of, but with sophisticated look.
